sql.query:
SELECT COUNT(id) AS CountId
FROM m_restaurant
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{$_GET.rest_id}} */ AND market_id = :P2 /* {{$_GET.market}} */

SELECT m_restaurant.id AS rest_id, m_restaurant.cat_type_id, m_restaurant.gen_shop_id, m_restaurant.shop_name_hin AS shop_name, m_restaurant.shop_logo, m_restaurant.address, rsi.cover_image, m_restaurant.blank1 AS geo_loc, m_restaurant.blank2 AS deliv_time, m_restaurant.blank3 AS deliv_charge
FROM m_restaurant
LEFT JOIN rest_sliding_img AS rsi ON (rsi.rest_id = m_restaurant.id)
WHERE m_restaurant.id = :P1 /* {{$_GET.rest_id}} */ AND m_restaurant.market_id = :P2 /* {{$_GET.market}} */

SELECT AVG(review_value) AS avg_review
FROM r_rest_review
WHERE rest_id = :P1 /* {{$_GET.rest_id}} */ AND status = 1

SELECT m_restaurant.id AS rest_id, m_restaurant.cat_type_id, m_restaurant.gen_shop_id, m_restaurant.shop_name_bn AS shop_name, m_restaurant.shop_logo, m_restaurant.address, rsi.cover_image, m_restaurant.blank1 AS geo_loc, m_restaurant.blank2 AS deliv_time, m_restaurant.blank3 AS deliv_charge
FROM m_restaurant
LEFT JOIN rest_sliding_img AS rsi ON (rsi.rest_id = m_restaurant.id)
WHERE m_restaurant.id = :P1 /* {{$_GET.rest_id}} */ AND m_restaurant.market_id = :P2 /* {{$_GET.market}} */

SELECT AVG(review_value) AS avg_review
FROM r_rest_review
WHERE rest_id = :P1 /* {{$_GET.rest_id}} */ AND status = 1

FROM m_restaurant
LEFT JOIN rest_sliding_img AS rsi ON (rsi.rest_id = m_restaurant.id)
WHERE m_restaurant.id = :P1 /* {{$_GET.rest_id}} */ AND m_restaurant.market_id = :P2 /* {{$_GET.market}} */

SELECT AVG(review_value) AS avg_review
FROM r_rest_review
WHERE rest_id = :P1 /* {{$_GET.rest_id}} */ AND status = 1
